gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Pelicans 126, Trail Blazers 107
gameRecap.excerpt: The Pelicans win the sixth of their last seven games as they defeated the Blazers, 126-107. CJ McCollum led four Pelicans with 20 or more with 30 points and eight assists as Zion Williamson (26 points, 10 rebounds) and Brandon Ingram (22 points, seven rebounds) totaled 48. Dalano Banton led Portland with 28 points, five rebounds, and six assists while Anfernee Simons added 25 points, four rebounds, and eight assists.
